abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "TaxonKey is one of (Tracheophyta, Lepidoptera)", "BasisOfRecord is one of (Observation, Human Observation, Specimen)", "StateProvince is one of (Maryland)", "HasCoordinate is true", "Year 1989-2021" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 70 records from University of Delaware Insect Research Collection 7 records from Marie-Victorin Herbarium (MT) - Plantes vasculaires 2 records from Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University Insect Collection 1 records from University of British Columbia Herbarium (UBC) - Vascular Plant Collection 4 records from Bruce Bennett Herbarium (BABY) 99 records from San Diego Natural History Museum Entomology Department 2 records from Clemson University Herbarium 3 records from Auburn University, John D. Freeman Herbarium 7 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Botany 3 records from Rutgers University, Chrysler Herbarium 1 records from UTEP Plants (Arctos) 2 records from Western Washington University Insect Collection 49 records from Academy of Natural Sciences Entomology Collection - LepNet 309 records from University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill Herbarium: Vascular Plants 7 records from Biodiversity4all Research-Grade Observations 514 records from The Lepidopterists' Society Season Summary 70 records from C.P. Gillette Museum of Arthropod Diversity 1 records from Desert Botanical Garden Herbarium 1 records from US herbarium - Smithsonian Institute - Amostras Brasileiras Repatriadas - Herbário Virtual REFLORA 19 records from NEON Biorepository Terrestrial Plant Collection (Herbarium Vouchers) 14 records from Frost Entomological Museum 3 records from University of Georgia Collection of Arthropods 262495 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations 110 records from Mississippi Museum of Natural Science Herbarium 7 records from CONN 2 records from UAM Herbarium (ALA), Vascular Plant Collection (Arctos) 3 records from Essig Museum of Entomology 1 records from Illinois Natural History Survey Insect Collection 1 records from Cleveland Museum of Natural History 9 records from Arizona State University Hasbrouck Insect Collection 10 records from Campbell University Herbarium 3 records from The Albert J. Cook Arthropod Research Collection 4 records from Intermountain Herbarium (Vascular plants & algae) 655 records from Tropicos Specimen Data 1 records from Appalachian State University, I. W.
